name: Super Dashmatch
description: Super Dashmatch is a one-screen Multiplayer Party Game, in which players control fighting orbs on a shape-shifting arena. Players have to dash their opponents out of the game to win. Super Dashmatch is a local and online multiplayer game for 2 to 4 players.
minimum_requirements: OS: OS 10.1/Windows 7 or higher Processor: Dual Core 2.4Ghz or equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 8800 GT / AMD HD 6850 / Intel HD Graphics 4400 or above Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card Additional Notes: Gamepads highly recommended
